description:
The gang meets Ren, a young girl with Fifth Sword. She likes running and working out, but feels left out when she`s with the other girls in her club. Is there a better place for her to belong?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Courage Will Always Give You Strength!
Yuuki wa Kanarazu Chikara o Kureru!
勇気は必ず力をくれる!
